dublin_core.dcvalue: Since 1999 several articles have been published on genome wide and or proteome wide response after exposure to radiofrequency RF fields whose signal and intensities were similar to or typical of those of currently used mobile telephones These studies were performed using powerful high throughput screening techniques HTSTs of transcriptomics and or proteomics which allow for the simultaneous screening of the expression of thousands of genes or proteins
Gene and protein expression following exposure to radiofrequency fields from mobile phones.
